data.prayer: Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Rawalpindi, Punjab, Pakistan. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Rawalpindi, Punjab, Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Rawalpindi.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who are far from you in Rawalpindi. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Rawalpindi, Punjab, Pakistan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Rawalpindi unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.
Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the county of Rawalpindi
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the county of Rawalpindi, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.
